# CMRecordedPressureData

**Class**

A recorded measurement of pressure data.

## Declaration

```swift
class CMRecordedPressureData
```

## Overview

Use SensorKit’s [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensor/ambientPressure] sensor to read ambient pressure data.

## Instance Properties

- **identifier**: A value that uniquely identifies this measurement.
- **startDate**: The time and date when the system recorded the measurement.

## Ambient pressure

- **CMAmbientPressureData**: A measurement of the ambient pressure and temperature.

## Inherits From

- CMAmbientPressureData

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
